name: Face (itch) (Jelleh, Rainy, Jake Meaker)
description:
This game is for Falmouth University's GGJ 2021! 

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/face-0

Trapped in an abandoned hospital, you have only a flashlight to navigate the dingy wards and find a way to escape. You aren't the only thing creeping around in the darkness though, so tread carefully, lest you lose more than just your nerve. 

WASD = Movement 

Spacebar = Interact
